1152.content: One day in Pixie Hollow, Tinkerbell was walking along the shore line of the beach, bored out of her mind. It was a sort of day off for all of the tinker fairies, and was actually supposed to be a day to celebrate all of the things that they build and repair for the other fairies throughout the year. However, despite the "festivities", Tinkerbell felt like there was nothing exciting going on. She was just strolling along the shore, looking out and the waves, when suddenly...
1152.title: Blueberry

11523.content:
Tinkerbell was looking at the waves crashing in the water when a strange looking plant caught her eye. It was like nothing that she had ever seen in Pixie Hollow before, and, now that she thought of it, had never seen on any of her adventures before, either. She walked over to it, not taking her eyes off it, just in case it was actually some sort of strange creature in a hibernation state of sorts. It was, however, just a strange, new plant, and it did not harm Tinkerbell in any way. In fact, if anything, it gifted her with something: a beautiful aroma.

Tinkerbell, upon approaching the strange looking bush, as she now recognized it to be, noticed that it was letting off a sweet smell that made her smile. She also noticed that it was covered in shiny, little, blue berries that looked too plump and delicious to be of any harm to anyone, especially an innocent fairy. Tinkerbell, ebing the curious type, just had to try one. She plucked one from it's branch and popped it in her mouth, and the moment she swallowed the sweet treat, her skin tinted blue.

"What happened to my skin?!" Tinkerbell said to herself, alarmed by the sudden change of her skin color. "Maybe I just have to eat a few more to make the effects wear off." Tinkerbell's logic was wrong. As she continued eating the berries, she continued to get bluer and bluer, until she was as blue as the berries she was eating. That's when she started to grow.

After Tinkerbell was completely blue, the blueberries started to make her grow instead of making her change to a different color. Starting at her hips, she ballooned out a little bit with every blueberry that she ate. She started getting taller as well as wider, and soon she was just a big, blue ball. Her wings were left unchanged, but every other part of her, even her hair, had been affected by the berries. Her hands, feet, and head were just little dots on her, and she found them to be completely useless.

Tinkerbell knew that she had to get out of there somehow, so she decided to...
11523.title: She sees a strange looking plant

11532.content:
It was a normal day in the village, and Tink was flying around looking for something to do when she was approached by Silvermist who looked a bit different than usual.

"Hey, Tink! said Silvermist "Are you going to the match too?"

"What match?" Tink said with utter confusion.

"The sumo match!" Said Silvermist "It's happening later this month and I was wondering if you were gonna go. I've been putting on a few pounds to show my support. And by that, I mean enter this year."

"What's the weight requirements?" Said Tink.

"Around 400-500 pounds. Why do you ask?" Said Silvermist

"Because I was gonna enter myself this year. And what's the fastest way to put on pounds?" Said Tink

"Oh, that's easy. I heard one of the dustweavers made a weight gain dust if you wanna try it out." Said Silvermist

"Okay, thanks!" Said Tink.

She flew off without another word.
